Posts.Content: Jul 24, 2014 06:58PM Kmenditto wrote: I'm new here, stumbled upon this site while searching for post surgery answers: how long does it take for the implants to drop after surgery? I have permanent implants, not expanders. The doctor assured me they are much bigger than before (I was barely a B), but right now I feel like they are smaller ðŸ˜” Suggestions on sleeping? I just got my tubes out 2 days ago, but the move from recliner to bed didn't go as planned. I can sleep about 2-3 hours before I have to get up, stretch, walk, my back is so sore!
Posts.Title: CALLING ALL STAGE I SISTERS sheila888 MCBaker
